phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Looks like his own ultimate spell did a number on him, too.
Asta and the others were able to defeat the leader
of the Eye of the Midnight Sun, Licht.
But it was then that the strongest three in the Eye of the Midnight Sun,
Well, this definitely does not look good.
How dare you insects do that to my comrades?
I hate those who have hurt Licht.
Raia the Disloyal, Vetto the Despair, and Fana the Hateful.
I have nothing to worry about, now that you are here.
Faced with the trio's far superior strength, the situation looked dire.
I think it is about time we end this.
But then, the captain of the Green Praying Mantises, Jack the Ripper;
the captain of the Blue Rose Knights, Charlotte Roselei;
and the captain of the Silver Eagles, Nozel Silva, arrived.
Looks like you are having fun, Yami.
I am so glad you are safe.
And then Baro turned into mud.
So in the end, you two were being used by the Eye of the Midnight Sun, too?
But it is true that my brother and I kidnapped the children and stole their magic.
So I plan to atone for both my sins and my brother's.
I will turn myself in to the Magic Knights.
And when you are done with that, let us be buddies.
You can use really cool magic, so you would be really popular!
There is no point in apologizing to me.
You are going to be his friend
as soon as you atone for your crimes, right?
Then you also need to pray for Asta's safe return.
I-It is not like I care what happens to Stupidsta.
I do not care at all!
Why does this keep happening lately?!
Also, who am I making excuses to?!
I wonder if she is the one Asta gave his heart to.
There is no way he would give me the time of day with someone like her around.
No, I should not be thinking about that right now.
I have to do everything I can for when Asta and the others come back.
You were hogging these fun-looking enemies all to yourself.
They are pretty much like paper.
I was just about to finish them off when you butted in, you jerk.
Look how beat up you are.
Actually, why do not I use this opportunity to slice you up, too?
Vent all of my past grudges.
I will only do it when you are in tip-top shape.
How long are you just going to sit there?
You are so pathetic for a man.
The ground just loves me so much, it will not let my ass go.
There is no way the ground would love an outlaw like you.
You are never going to find a guy who will marry you with that attitude.
I do not need to marry anyone!
Why did I insult him again?
More importantly, how did I fall for someone like that?
Even so, I just cannot get him out of my head.
I cannot just come out and say that I l-like him now.
Besides, what would my knights say about that?
Now's not the time for this.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun...
The top brass of the traitors who attacked our country are all in a row.
I will bury them with my own hands.
Thanks for your consideration, Mr. Ball of Pride.
Hey, I wonder how he gets his hair like that.
Does not he just get one of his servants to do it, since he is royalty?
I am sure he is got his own hair stylist.
He actually has someone do it for him?
Wait, so he does that braid himself?
Shall I bury you lot first?
Nah, do not waste your magic on a foreigner.
Stay out of this, pond scum.
When the captains are on the battlefield,
mediocre combatants will only slow us down.
Especially a lowly peasant with no magic like yourself.
True despair lies at the end of an endless battle!
And the despair of the strongest fighters is the ultimate spice!
What the hell is he talking about?
I guess I will do my best for Licht.
Right, so I call dibs on that pretty lady!
If I win, we are going drinking together!
In that case, we will never raise glasses together.
Briar Creation Magic: Corpse-Hunting Briar Trees!
You get to fight me, big guy!
You are just a praying mantis!
I will tear off your limbs and wings while you are still alive!
The one I have business with is you.
You want to hurt Licht, too?
Want me to switch with you, Sparkles?
As if flames like those could hurt me.
Just who do you think I spent years competing with?!
They are practically a natural disaster!
I cannot see through all this dust!
Hey, that is cutting it a little close, Jack.
I am surprised Nozel's braid stays in place.
Try it, even if you cannot see them.
You have recovered enough spatial magic for one trip, have not you?
Let us let them handle this and
True, Magic Knights captains are strong.
But they cannot defeat the Third Eye...
Because we are loved by mana.
This must be some kind of mistake.
For that mere human with no magical powers, who is not loved by mana,
I must hurry and retrieve it.
I finally weakened him this much.
There is no way I am letting him go!
I figured you would try that!
Looks like you underestimated our boss too much.
You are after the leader's head, too, right?
How did he get through the smoke from this melee?
If you can read ki, it are not impossible.
Thanks for believing I would take a shot at you.
I believed in our no-magic idiot!
You have got some nerve, looking away!
Let us finish off the rest of them!
There will not be any other reinforcements, will there?
Let us finish him off while the others are being held up!
Because of that brat's anti-magic attack,
the sealing magic on Licht has been broken!
That power's being held back for the day that is to come...
Why do you have that grimoire?
have the Demon-Slayer Sword and the Demon-Dweller Sword?
Those swords belong to the master!
the master should refer to the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
Does this mean it is not him?
All this about getting something back, or something belonging to the master...
What the heck are you even talking about?
This crappy grimoire and these crappy swords belong to me!
Stop making false accusations, you crazy bastard!
A human like you should not have them.
I need to get them back.
It swallowed up my severing magic!
Such an incredible concentration of magic!
He will blow this whole area away!
Even we will not be able to stop that!
His power was actually restricted before?
I knew I should not have come!
Actually, I wish I would never even joined this squad!
If we defeat him and this power, we will leave our limits in the dust!
Do not you dare give up, Finral!
I am not completely recovered yet.
Can I reflect it with my remaining magic?
We will have to finish this next time.
If this keeps up, you will not last, Licht!
They are actually trying to seal that?
You worked a little too hard there, Licht.
Our boss is not feeling too good, so we are going to head home for today.
But the next time we meet, I will show you what true despair is!
Rodents will fall prey to the carnivores.
And that will be the end of you.
We, the Eye of the Midnight Sun, are always watching you.
Such an unbelievable amount of magic... and they were easily able to seal it.
They were not giving their all.
Not only do they all possess a great amount of mana,
but their control of natural mana was on another level.
Looks like they are loved by mana.
They are definitely worth slicing up.
But I will be the one to avenge you.
I am not sure if we actually won or if it is more like they ran away.
Pretty sure we can say we won if they ran away.
You did not do a thing.
Do not you have something to say?
What would have happened if we had not shown up?
I would not have let them escape like you did, and I would have defeated them all.
And I told you, that is not possible.
What a pathetic man you are.
I cannot believe that lot gave you so much trouble.
I cannot believe he was actually fighting those three alone.
I guess it is no wonder that I f-fell for him.
If you do not learn to be a little nicer, you are going to be single forever.
I told you, I do not care!
You should just worry about your partner!
If we are both still single when we are old, want to take care of each other?
I would not be caught dead with you!
Why cannot I ever just be honest?!
Yeah, I am not surprised he hit his limit.
Go get him fixed up, Finral.
You need to be of some use.
I am pretty sure I have been useful this whole time!
Licht pushed himself a little too far this time.
You are shaming the name of the Third Eye.
Er... So what do we do now?
Now that Licht's identity is known,
the Wizard King's bound to put everything into this investigation.
Geork and Catherine are still being held captive, too.
If they get anything out of them, this place...
It would not be good if they found things out this early.
I would rather not go, but I do not think I have a choice.
Honestly, why have I fallen for that overbearing,
crude man who does not even look like he is twenty-eight?!
I want to embrace him... with my briars.
What was that about Captain Yami, Sis?
I thought I heard something about briars.
I was thinking about how I wanted to bind that Yami tightly with my briars!
You want to torment him, right?
Man, you must really hate Captain Yami, Sis!
Who would want to even see his face?
I do not want to see his face.
I want to beat him with my briar whip!
Why cannot I be more honest?!
I will not forgive you, Magic Knights.
Black Clover, Page 38: The Magic Knights Captain Conference.
Page 38 The Magic Knights Captain Conference
